1.title: Me, Everyone, and Swimming in the Ocean!

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: A trip to the beach turns competitive after the girls get hit on, and Akihisa and Yuuji try to prove they have the skills necessary to be successful ladies men!

2.title: Me, a Yukata, and Festivities!

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Just when Akihisa and Yuuji start to feel like the girls may have forgiven them, they discover the worst is yet to come. The summer festival has some peculiar punishment in store for all the guys!

3.title: Me, That Girl, and a Stuffed Toy!

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: When Hideyoshi's tone-deaf twin is asked to sing the school song, he's roped into a costume change that's just asking for trouble. Then, Akihisa gets a new admirer--or two?--when he risks his neck to help Haduki cheer up her big sis.

4.title: Me, True Colors and a Man's Dignity!

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Complications arise after Mizuki and Shouko interrupt Akihisa's card game. Later, during a test of the Avatar system, the summoners of Class F are embarrassed to find their innermost thoughts revealed.

5.title: Me, Peeking, and Training Camp!

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: After Akihisa seeks Kouta's advice on how to deal with a troubling blackmail note, he learns that Yuuji is in a similar situation. Kouta's investigation uncovers clues that suggest one person is causing all of the problems.

6.title: Me, Peeking, and Male Friendship!

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: The search for the blackmailer continues, with Akihisa, Yuuji and the others narrowing in on a suspect: Aiko Kudou. In order to confirm their hunch, the gang once again sets out to sneak a peek during bath time.

7.title: Me, Peeking, and a Far Away Paradise!

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: The guys rally every male at camp to assist in their mission of peeping on the girls. After combining their abilities, they finally make it to the girls' restroom - only to see something none of them expected!

8.title: Me, Japan, and the Language I'm Unfamiliar With

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Flashback: When Minami arrived in Japan, she didn't know much of the language and had a tough time connecting with others. Her first encounter with Akihisa was awkward - but they soon became friends.

9.title: Me, Romance, and Negotiation Skills!

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Thanks to Minami kissing Akihisa in front of Mizuki, there's drama in the air and rumors of an impending war between Classes F, D, and B! Luckily, Class F has a plan that may give them the advantage!

10.title: Me, Romance, and Love Skills!

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Class F pulls out all the stops in an amazing battle against Class D! If Yoshii and his crew come out on top, they'll be taking on Class B too.

11.title: Yuuji, Shouko, and their Childhood Memories

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Flashback: In fifth grade, Yuuji's attitude makes him a target to the older kids in school. When Shouko tries to save Yuuji from a group of bullies, it doesn't take long before Yuuji is forced to rescue her!

12.title: Idiots, Clownery, and Requiem!

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: When Class F is challenged by some older students, the battle takes place in a haunted house. To win, Class F must get through without screaming. Unfortunately, the older kids have some scary tricks up their sleeves.

13.title: Idiots, Tests, and Summoned Beasts!

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Unhappy with the results of their battle against Class F, Class A demands a rematch! This time it's going to be one on one - Shouko versus Yoshii!

1.title: Idiots, Classes, and a Summoning War

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Class F's Akihisa Yoshii is one of the worst students at Fumizuki Academy. He probably doesn't stand a chance in the Summoner Test War - but he'll do his best for Mizuki Himeji!

2.title: Lilies, Roses, and Physical Education

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Class A calls out Class F, and there's some bad blood in the past between members of the groups. The 5-on-5 grudge match is about to begin - unfortunately, Akihisa glued his hand to a table!

3.title: Food Expenses, Dates, and Stun Guns

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: With the Summoner Test War out of the way for the foreseeable future, an outing to the movies with Himeji and Minami leads Akihisa to a surprising find - a love letter!

4.title: Love, Spice, and Boxed Lunches

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Akihisa's in a tough situation: if he doesn't eat the lunch prepared by Himeji, he might hurt her feelings. But if he does decide to eat it, he might not survive her cooking!

5.title: Map, Treasures, and Striker Sigma V

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Akihisa and friends participate in a treasure hunting test. Answering questions correctly will lead to great rewards - but with all the Summoner teams looking for the same prizes, a battle might be tough to avoid!

6.title: Me, the Pool, Swimsuit Paradise... and...

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Akihisa gets a chance to test out his new bracelet in battle - but all the real action is taking place at the swimming pool!

7.title: Ore to Shouko to Kirasagi gurando pâku

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: The gang puts on disguises to make sure Yuji and Shouko have fun at the amusement park, but the day takes a surprising turn thanks to an unexpected marriage proposal!

8.title: Runaway, Mazes, and the Summoned Beast Instrumentality Project

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Something is wrong with the Avatars at Fumizuki Academy; the beings aren't just acting weird, they look a lot different too. Luckily, Yoshii might be able to solve the problem.

9.title: Kisu to basuto to pônîtêru

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Yoshii's got to prove to his visiting sister that he can handle living alone. It won't be easy, thanks to a misunderstood text message, some dirty magazines, and Minami and Himeji's new makeovers.

10.title: Moshi to kaitou to raburetâ

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

12.title: Ai to yuuki to oretachi no tatakai wa korekarada!

episode of.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: The showdown between the best and the worst is underway! Yoshii's crew unleashes with all they've got against Class A, battling all over campus - and above it. Will Class F's training finally pay off?

imdb.plot outline: All the students in a school are distributed according to their individual score in a test into six section and are treated according to their section. The least scoring students then makes a resolution to gain back their status and that a mere score in a test doesn't really describes an individual personal brilliance.
imdb.title: Baka and Test: Summon the Beasts
plot: All the students in a school are distributed according to their individual score in a test into six section and are treated according to their section. The least scoring students then makes a resolution to gain back their status and that a mere score in a test doesn't really describes an individual personal brilliance.
